vote.title: To recognize March 24th 2021 as Equal Pay Day in Columbus and commend Women for Economic and Leadership Development for their effort to raise awareness on the gender pay gap.
vote.description:
Title
 
To recognize March 24th 2021 as Equal Pay Day in Columbus and commend Women for Economic and Leadership Development for their effort to raise awareness on the gender pay gap.
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Equal Pay Day is the symbolic day dedicated to raising awareness of the gender pay gap; and
 
WHEREAS, this day denotes how far into the new year women must work to be paid what men were paid the previous year; and 
 
WHEREAS, started by the National Committee on Pay Equity (NCPE) in 1996, the goal was to raise awareness about the gender wage gap; and
 
WHEREAS, today, various Equal Pay Days are recognized to denote that mothers and most women of color face a wider-than-average gap and need to work even longer to catch up to men’s earnings; and
 
WHEREAS, Women for Economic and Leadership Development’s (WELD) mission is to develop and advance women’s leadership to strengthen the economic prosperity of the communities it serves; and
 
WHEREAS, WELD provides women with specific tools to enhance their individual economic status and builds programs to support female leadership development and business growth; and
 
WHEREAS, WELD builds awareness about pay disparity, especially that experienced by women of color, in the national forums it hosts; and
 
WHEREAS, these forums bring actions to words by providing specific strategies that individuals, businesses and organizations can implement to close the gaps; and
 
WHEREAS, WELD helps the corporate arena understand the connections between the lack of diverse representation on their boards and in their executive ranks; and 
 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: 
 
That this Council does hereby, recognize March 24th 2021 as Equal Pay Day in the City of Columbus and commend Women for Economic Leadership and Development for their effort to raise awareness on the gender pay gap.
